description: Pun on Nobel Prize with knock-knock joke inventor.
title: No Bell Prize
n_1: Jester pitches his joke to a stern-looking judge in a grand hall.
n_2: Jester grins, performing his best knock-knock routine.
n_3: Judge ponders, then shows a smile, amused by the wit.
c1_3: How about a No Bell Prize?
n_4: Jester bows triumphantly as the judge claps, award in hand.
